about_the_game:
Eternal Traveler Supporter Pack


The Ancient Era. A time when Eterra herself reforged the world and spread life through an otherwise barren land. The Eternal Traveler Supporter Pack will keep the Ancient Era close to your heart as you explore the dangers of Eterra. This pack includes the Ancient Way Portal, Verdant Shroud back piece, and the Ancient YiQi collector’s pet.

Ancient Way Portal

In the darkest of moments, sometimes all we need is a single source of hope. The Ancient Way Portal brings a window into the ancient era into whatever dark and maddening era from which you need an escape.

The portal’s ancient pull holds rock and debris in orbit as the light from the Ancient Era pierces through. A clear vision of a bygone age parallaxes with your movement as you rush toward your escape.


Verdant Shroud

Take shelter under the comfort and protection of the Verdant Shroud, and look great while doing it. The Shroud is covered in Ancient Foliage creating the foundation for new life to sprout forth and flourish.


Ancient YiQi

The Ancient YiQi is part of Last Epoch’s newest collectible pet series. The YiQi is a fiercely loyal pet who has taken a particular liking to you Traveler, following you not only across Eterra, but on your journey through time as well. Choose your favorite era’s YiQi, or start your quest to collect them all.


150 Bonus Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.

Please note that DLC packs are non-refundable. If you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Before purchasing this DLC, please check that you do not already have it.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: The Imperial Era. A time when humanity is on the decline under a ruthless emperor that has embraced undeath. Nature has begun to die and the relentless undead empire is knocking on your door. This pack includes Reaper’s Call Portal, Death Toll back piece, and the Imperial YiQi collector’s pet.
